snippet: Big data has incredible power. It also has limitations not everyone understands. (Try our Twitter quiz and see.)
abstract: The Upshot column; algorithms armed with big data can do some impressive things but new big-data tools, amazing as they are, are not magic; like every great invention before, big data has limitations not everyone understands.
lead_paragraph: Big data has incredible power. It also has limitations not everyone understands. (Try our Twitter quiz and see.)

headline.seo: A 25-Question Twitter Quiz to Predict Retweets
headline.main: Why Computers Won’t Be Replacing You Just Yet
headline.print_headline: Why Computers Won’t Replace You Just Yet
